TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the event that occurs when components are added to the toolbox.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.ComponentsCreating> event is raised when components are about to be added to the toolbox. <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs> provides data indicating the designer that has requested that the components be added.
## Examples The following example method returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs> that indicates the designer host that is about to receive a new component or set of components:
[!code-cpp[MoreEventArgsExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MoreEventArgsExamples/CPP/class1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MoreEventArgsExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MoreEventArgsExamples/CS/class1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MoreEventArgsExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MoreEventArgsExamples/VB/class1.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost host) cil managed

Docs.param: The designer host that is making the request.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets an instance of the that made the request to create toolbox components.
Docs.value: The that made the request to create toolbox components, or if no designer host was provided to the toolbox item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property can be `null` if no designer host was provided to the toolbox item.
